body:
Hey Everyone!
Just asking for anyone who is interested what do you think of creating a Avicus Podcast? It would be broadcasted LIVE most of the time through the community channel on YouTube. 

Opinions and Suggestions for segments?

Thanks Guys
You legends 
shadowolf365
body_tagged:
Hey Everyone!
Just asking for anyone who is interested what do you think of creating a Avicus Podcast? It would be broadcasted LIVE most of the time through the community channel on YouTube.

Thanks Guys
You legends 
shadowolf365
title: Opinions of creating  a Avicus Podcast

replies.body:
I LOVE the idea, but a podcast only works if there's a mix of serious discussion with a little bit of banter.

I assume Avicus podcasts will just be an hour of stupid jokes, memes and banter the entire time, which doesn't make for the best listening experience.

But I'd be keen regardless, just my opinion.

Sign me up!
replies.body_tagged:
I LOVE the idea, but a podcast only works if there's a mix of serious discussion with a little bit of banter.

I assume Avicus podcasts will just be an hour of stupid jokes, memes and banter the entire time, which doesn't make for the best listening experience.

But I'd be keen regardless, just my opinion.

Sign me up!

replies.body:
i think this'd be pretty neat c: how often do you intend on doing a podcast?

oh! and i have some segment suggestions: guessing/finding out the contexts behind quotes on the quote thread & not ships (^: (don't think i've forgotten new years eve)

replies.body: whatever you do please don't play the most overused NCS tunes of all time. I might FADE :D
replies.body_tagged: whatever you do please don't play the most overused NCS tunes of all time. I might FADE :D

replies.body: Yeah, no way I am using NCS... I don't really like their music. I am with another YouTube music channel that I use.

replies.body:
I intend to do this podcast a) however often it takes to make it b) how much support it gets and feedback as well.
I think to begin I will start with once every 2 weeks.

" guessing/finding out the contexts behind quotes on the quote thread"
Love that idea! I will want to incorporate that into the podcast.

New Years Eve???

replies.body: The podcast would need to be planned a lot so that discussion can be held throughout the entire stream. Interesting content would be a must, no one wants wishy washy content.
replies.body_tagged: The podcast would need to be planned a lot so that discussion can be held throughout the entire stream. Interesting content would be a must, no one wants wishy washy content.

replies.body:
Agreed.
I would much rather prefer a 30 minute podcast that's entertaining throughout the entire video as opposed to a 1 hour podcast that feels dead and unorganised.
replies.body_tagged:
Agreed.

replies.body: I completely agree with your point as well. I have done a podcast before on my main channel and I am hoping to use the same system as to just writing up points, stories, and segments to refer to if everyone is going off topic.
